package July2023;

public class arthmetic1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		int a =50;
		int b =20;
		int c = a+b;
		int d = a-b;
		int e = a*b;
		int f = a/b;
		System.out.println("The value of Addition is:" +c);
		System.out.println("The value of Subtraction is:" +d);
		System.out.println("The value of Multiplication  is:" +e);
		System.out.println("The value of Divison is:" +f);
	}

}
